title: Designer Fragrances 6 Pack Daisee & Tu Est Belle Fabric Freshener - Fragranced Light Mist Fresheners All Household Fabrics Leaving Fresh Smelling & Breezy For Days – 500ml
features: SCENTS MADE FROM NATURAL OILS - Designer Fragrances Daisee & Tu Est Belle Fabric Freshener Sprays. Daisee is a bright, floral, and sunny scent of wild berries and jasmine that reminds you of carefree summers. In contrast, Tu Est Belle is a delicate and demure scent with iris, jasmine and patchouli. Created from only natural oils and carefully selected ingredients. Designer Fragrance sprays are the perfect way of freshening up your fabrics. This bundle contains 3 x Designer Fragrances Daisee and 3 x Tu Est Belle Fabric Freshener Sprays.

LIFE IS GOOD - EVERYTHING SMELLS AMAZING! - Our Fabric Fresheners are all you need for an instant refresh that leaves your home fabrics smelling fabulous for longer. The spray gets to work fast, neutralising odours and leaving behind nothing but a gorgeous scent. Instantly eradicates and deodorises pets, food and other odours, These fabric freshener sprays for your home are a favourite for those who are house-proud, bringing a rich and clean smell to your home.

NEUTRALISE ALL FABRIC ODOURS - The ideal solution to freshen up the soft fabrics around your home such as sofas and cushions. Quick drying with a range of gorgeously long-lasting fragrances inspired by your favourite designer's scents. Fill your home or car with the luxury scents in our Fabric Fresheners range. It is safe to use, wherever you choose including sofas, car seats, and cushions.

QUICK DRYING - EASY-TO-USE - LONG LASTING SPRAY - Designer Fragrances Fabric Fresheners contain quick-drying, fast-acting spray. Simply shake the bottle well then hold 10-20cm away making sure the nozzle is directed towards the target area, spray your fabric 2-3 times and leave to dry.

SUPPORT A PROUD UK BRAND - Designer Fragrances was established in 2019 in Manchester by Asiffa and Shiraz. Designer Fragrances has created something unique in the spray market that combines long-lasting fragrances and much-loved scents to eliminate odours everywhere. Designer Fragrances also champions climate-friendly CFC-free products and you can also recycle the can after use.
